name: Romance At The Rink
description:
Selena has been waiting for her town's figure skating winter showcase all year. 

Her excitement turns to doubt when the organiser insists she partner up, and her fear only grows when she finds out her partner is none other than her childhood friend turned rival, Levi.

Will the two lift each other to success? Or will it all spiral out of control?

The project is currently available as a demo. 10k words, or the first half of the game was completed during Winter VN Jam 2022. 
Development will continue, and the second half will release in January 2023.

Enjoyed the demo? Please leave a comment or a rating!

~20k words, 1-2 hours of playtime
1 dateable character
4 CGs, two illustrations and two chibi!
Original Backgrounds
Partially Voiced
6 Track OST
Warning! This game contains:
Profanity, alcohol consumption, discussions of mental health.
